goal.ch:
1.帶領同學閱讀台灣當代散文作品，讓同學對散文主題及書寫技巧，有初步的認識。
2.從閱讀散文的過程中，學習散文的創作技巧，進而從個人的生命簡史中，提煉值得書寫的題材，透過課堂的互動討論，帶領同學完成散文作品，投稿校內外文學獎。
3.本課程著重於閱讀後的寫作練習，因此將於課間安排三次課堂寫作，隔週則進行散文作品閱讀與佳作分享，協助同學累積數篇個人散文作品，未來可投稿文藝會等相關單位的作品集補助。
goal.en:
1.This course will lead students to read contemporary Taiwanese essays and provide them with an initial understanding of essay themes and writing techniques.
2. Through the process of reading prose, students learn the skills of writing prose, and then refine the topics worthy of writing from the brief history of one‘s life. Through interactive discussions in the classroom, students are led to complete their prose works and submit them for literary awards both inside and outside the school.
3. This course emphasizes writing practice after reading, so three classroom writing sessions will be arranged during the course, and every other week we will conduct prose reading and sharing to help students accumulate several pieces of personal prose, which can be submitted to the Literature and Art Association and other related organizations for portfolio grants in the future.

outline.en: The readings in this course focus on everyday topics, including food and drink, touch and feel, place and space, history and time, travel and movement, as well as the memories of family and growing up that essay writers touch on most often.
